channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 埃及和中国在联合声明中强调红海航行安全优先
item.description: Egypt and China are closely following developments in the Red Sea, focusing on the priority of ensuring the safety and security of navigation, they said in a joint statement on Sunday.翻译:埃及和中国在周日的联合声明中表示，密切关注红海事态发展，重点关注确保航行安全。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 危地马拉阿雷瓦洛即将就任总统，前路艰难
item.description: Guatemalan President-elect Bernardo Arevalo is due to be sworn in Sunday for a four-year term, pledging to banish deep-rooted corruption, though he will come up against a divided Congress and string of judicial attempts to block him from wielding power.翻译:危地马拉当选总统贝尔纳多·阿雷瓦洛将于周日宣誓就职，任期四年，承诺消除根深蒂固的腐败，尽管他将面临分裂的国会和一系列阻止他行使权力的司法尝试。
item.author: Sofia Menchu

item.title: 台湾大选让世界市场松了一口气，但令当地投资者担忧
item.description: Taiwan's election could allay global concerns about the island's relations with China, while prompting a light selloff domestically on Monday as investors worry the result could hinder economic policy.翻译:台湾大选可能会缓解全球对台湾与中国关系的担忧，同时引发周一国内股市小幅抛售，因为投资者担心选举结果可能会阻碍经济政策。
item.author: Tom Westbrook, Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 中国外交官谴责外国政府就台湾大选后发表的言论
item.description: China's foreign ministry and embassies around the world this weekend warned countries against supporting Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and condemned foreign governments that congratulated the island's president-elect Lai Ching-te.翻译:中国外交部和世界各地的大使馆本周末警告各国不要支持台湾民进党（DPP），并谴责祝贺台湾当选总统赖清德的外国政府。
item.author: Eduardo Baptista

item.title: 美国前官员将访问台湾进行大选后会谈
item.description: Two former senior U.S. officials will arrive in Taiwan on Sunday for post-election talks and underscore the U.S. government's "longstanding interest" in peace across the Taiwan Strait, the de facto U.S. embassy in Taipei said.翻译:美国驻台北事实上的大使馆表示，两名前美国高级官员将于周日抵达台湾进行选举后会谈，并强调美国政府对台海和平的“长期利益”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 朝鲜外相将访问俄罗斯 - 朝中社
item.description: North Korea's Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui will visit Russia from January 15 to 17, North Korea's state KCNA news agency said on Sunday.翻译:朝鲜官方通讯社朝中社周日称，朝鲜外交部长崔善姬将于 1 月 15 日至 17 日访问俄罗斯。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国比亚迪与巴西Sigma Lithium就供应协议进行谈判 - FT
item.description: Chinese electric car-maker BYD has held talks with Brazil's Sigma Lithium over a possible supply agreement, joint venture or acquisition, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.翻译:据英国《金融时报》周日报道，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪已与巴西西格玛锂业就可能的供应协议、合资或收购进行了谈判。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾新总统面临中国压力，未获得多数席位
item.description: Lai Ching-te won by a comfortable margin though with less than half the vote, but his party lost control of parliament on which the president-elect will have to rely to pass legislation and spending.翻译:赖清德虽然以不到一半的选票以微弱优势获胜，但他的政党失去了对议会的控制权，当选总统将不得不依靠议会来通过立法和支出。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu, James Pomfret

item.title: 朝鲜发射导弹，紧张局势升级，部长将访问俄罗斯
item.description: North Korea has stepped up pressure on Seoul in recent weeks, declaring it the "principal enemy", and vowing to enhance its ability to deliver a nuclear strike on the U.S. and America's allies in the Pacific.翻译:最近几周，朝鲜加大了对首尔的压力，宣称其为“主要敌人”，并誓言要增强对美国及其太平洋盟友进行核打击的能力。
item.author: Ju-Min Park, Makiko Yamazaki

item.title: 中方反对日方向台湾当选总统贺电
item.description: The Chinese embassy in Japan said on Sunday that it "resolutely opposed" Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa's statement congratulating Taiwan's new president-elect Lai Ching-te.翻译:中国驻日本大使馆周日表示，“坚决反对”日本外务大臣上川洋子祝贺台湾新当选总统赖清德的声明。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾新当选总统赖清德将面临中国的愤怒
item.description: Lai repeatedly said during the campaign that he wanted to keep the status quo with China, and offered to talk to Beijing. But in Beijing's view, he is a separatist and a "troublemaker through and through."翻译:赖在竞选期间多次表示，他希望与中国保持现状，并提出与北京对话。但在北京看来，他是一个分裂主义者，是一个“彻头彻尾的麻烦制造者”。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 西藏不是焦点，镇压持续存在：流亡前领导人
item.description: The plight of Tibet has become less discussed internationally but repression continues and China is applying what it did there to other regions, a former head of the Tibetan government-in-exile said on Saturday.翻译:西藏流亡政府前领导人周六表示，国际上对西藏困境的讨论越来越少，但镇压仍在继续，中国正在将其在其他地区的做法应用到其他地区。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 布林肯与中国官员讨论人权、台海问题
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday raised concerns over China's human rights issues in a meeting with senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington, the State Department said, adding they also discussed "maintaining peace and stability" in the Taiwan Strait.翻译:美国国务院表示，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯周五在华盛顿会见中国高级官员刘建超时表达了对中国人权问题的担忧，并补充说，他们还讨论了“维护台湾海峡的和平与稳定”。
item.author: Kanishka Singh

item.title: 台湾选民拒绝中国，执政党获得第三个总统任期
item.description: Lai Ching-te's party, which champions Taiwan's separate identity and rejects China's territorial claims, was seeking a third term. Beijing framed the elections as a choice between war and peace.翻译:赖清德领导的政党主张台湾的独立身份，拒绝中国的领土主张，正在寻求第三次连任。北京将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu

item.title: 中国敦促加强房地产业融资协调
item.description: China's housing ministry and financial regulator asked local governments to better coordinate with financial institutions to provide financing support to real estate projects, as policymakers work to revive the sluggish housing market.翻译:在政策制定者努力重振低迷的房地产市场之际，中国住房和城乡建设部和金融监管机构要求地方政府更好地与金融机构协调，为房地产项目提供融资支持。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国2023年银行贷款创历史新高，但经济仍举步维艰
item.description: New bank lending in China rose less than expected in December, but 2023 lending hit a new record as the central bank kept policy accommodative to support an unexpectedly shaky economic recovery.翻译:12 月份中国新增银行贷款增幅低于预期，但由于央行保持宽松政策以支持意外不稳定的经济复苏，2023 年贷款创下新纪录。
item.author: Judy Hua, Kevin Yao

item.title: 在与中国的月球竞赛中，美国的挫折考验私营企业的作用
item.description: Two U.S. setbacks this week in the race to the moon with China illustrate the risks of NASA's plans to bet on a new strategy of relying heavily on private companies.翻译:本周美国在与中国的登月竞赛中遭遇的两次挫折说明了美国宇航局计划押注于严重依赖私营公司的新战略的风险。
item.author: Joey Roulette, Nivedita Bhattacharjee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 需求疲软，贷款收紧：香港房地产开发商面临艰难的2024年
item.description: Hong Kong's property companies face a squeeze in 2024 from rising funding costs and sluggish home sales and office rentals, making creditors and investors cautious about developers’ financial health.翻译:由于融资成本上升以及房屋销售和写字楼租金低迷，香港房地产公司将在 2024 年面临压力，这使得债权人和投资者对开发商的财务状况持谨慎态度。
item.author: Clare Jim

item.title: 台湾民众举行选举集会，中国誓言“粉碎独立阴谋”
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of people attended final pre-election rallies in Taiwan on Friday ahead of critical presidential and parliamentary polls, as China's defence ministry warned it would "smash any Taiwan independence plots".翻译:周五，在关键的总统和议会选举之前，数十万人参加了台湾的最后一次选举前集会，中国国防部警告称，将“粉碎任何台独阴谋”。
item.author: James Pomfret, Sarah Wu

item.title: 中国出口增长，但通货紧缩持续，经济迈入2024年基础不稳
item.description: More policy support seen as economy still fragile.翻译:经济仍脆弱，政策支持力度加大。
item.author: Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao
